text: Delicious local desserts at affordable prices. Tao Suan had crispy you tiao! Not too sweet and can see many older folks enjoying their desserts at the hawker centre. Worth saving some stomach space for!
A simple hot bowl of barley beancurd cooked with warmth. Slightly sweetened with generous and soft beancurd sheets. A classic stall that offers 5 other desserts.
Good old fashion dessert store 5mins walk from the MRT. Tasty and served hot. Their peach gum dessert is very delicious and fresh!

7/8/2024
Had bubur pulut hitam ($1.80) for dessert, was extremely good! Not overly sweet and fresh. I'll be back to try their other items.
Good dessert on a hot day. Highly recommend their Snow fungus peach gum. Naturally sweet and has generous amount of peach gum and crunchy pear bits. Very reasonable prices.
